table.name: vtiger_ordersmilestone
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ordersmilestone` ( `ordersmilestoneid` int(11) NOT NULL, `ordersmilestonename` varchar(255) default NULL, `ordersmilestone_no` varchar(100) default NULL, `ordersmilestonedate` varchar(255) default NULL, `ordersid` varchar(100) default NULL, `ordersmilestonetype` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ordersmilestoneid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ordersmilestonecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ordersmilestonecf` ( `ordersmilestoneid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`ordersmilestoneid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
